line_1: I expect not a Place, nor hope for a Pension,
line_2: The Love of the Muse is my only Pretension.

line_1: Yes, Sir; but Timon has a pension.
From the fears of a jail, and the hopes of a pension,
line_2: The tricks of a gamester, and oaths of an ensign:

line_1: By fixing on you a good pension.
line_2: Your friends are all met in convention,
